topics.body:
For those interested:
The rumors surrounding Nintendo NX aren't substantiated yet.  If you're reading gossip keep in mind the only thing we know yet is that Nintendo has been looking at a portable device to replace the wiiu and 3ds; the rumors about the price or hardware specifications haven't had any evidence to back them up yet.

topics.body:
I just thought of something physics wise; the reason why we don't have laser guns or phazers isn't cause of power usage but rather the amount of time it's outputted.  What I mean by this is to use an analogy lightning isn't a lot of electricity; it just outputs that energy almost instantly.  If you were to with a laser compress all that energy into a extremely small time frame the amount of damage it would do would be far more.  If say you were to take a AAA battery and output all of that energy as light in a microsecond into one incredibly small area it would blow a person in half.

Tl:dr; We don't have star trek phazers or such cause it would require superconductors and thus not be worth it financially for large scale production.
